definition: doing things to deliberately harm yourself
the money that you pay to travel by bus, plane, taxi, etc.
a range of food of a particular type
something that is offered to the public, especially as a form of entertainment
small pieces of coloured paper that people often throw at weddings over people who have just been married, or (in the US) at other special events
forming a basic, large or important part of something
to watch somebody/something and make sure that a job or an activity is done correctly
warm and slightly wet in an unpleasant way
a small animal with short legs, a long tail and cold blood, that lives both in water and on land (= is an amphibian)
slow to learn or develop mentally; finding it difficult to make progress in learning
a liquid used to make the mouth fresh and healthy
when a baby is teething, its first teeth are starting to grow
any of the first set of teeth in young children that drop out and are replaced by others
